con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../schemas/RQ_Authentication_Login.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> <xsd:schema> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../schemas/RS_Authentication_Login.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="InMessage"> <wsdl:part name="InMessageRequest" element="RQ_authentication_login"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="OutMessage"> <wsdl:part name="OutMessageResponse" element="RS_authentication_login"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="AuthenticateLoginInterface"> <wsdl:operation name="AuthenticateLogin"> <wsdl:input message="InMessage"/> <wsdl:output message="OutMessage"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="AuthenticateLoginSoapHttpBinding" type="AuthenticateLoginInterface"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" style="document"/> <wsdl:operation name="AuthenticateLogin"> <soap:operation style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="AuthenticateLoginService"> <wsdl:port name="AuthenticateLoginEndpoint" binding="AuthenticateLoginSoapHttpBinding"> <!--<soap:address location="http://rmt2.net/ServiceDispatch/soapRouter"/>--> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/ServiceRouterHub/soapRouter"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="RMT2_Message_Header_Type.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="authentication/Authentication_Type.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="RQ_authentication_login"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="header" type="header_type" minOccurs="1" nillable="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">Known as the Web Service Header. This element is to be used as part of the request data. Contains the data needed to identify and route message to its property service implementation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="login_credentials" type="user_login_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The user's login credentials that are to be authenticated.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:complexType name="header_type" mixed="false" abstract="false"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="message_id" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This is the name of the message to invoke</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="target_action" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This is the name of the service that will need to handle this message. This is useful in cases where the need arises to identify a distinct service handler when the message is suited to serve multiple services.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="delivery_mode" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">How MOM is supposed deliver the message...Asynchronous or Synchronous</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string" id="delivery_mode_type"> <xsd:enumeration value="ASYNC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SYNC"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="message_mode" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates if message is a request or response</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string" id="message_mode_type"> <xsd:enumeration value="REQUEST"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPONSE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="delivery_date" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The date and time this message was sent</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="session_id" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The session id used to verify user authenticity and accessibility</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="user_id" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The Id of the user requesting the service</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:complexType name="user_login_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the document that manages user's login credentials.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="uid" type="xsd:string" default="0" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The user's login id.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="pw" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The user's password.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="app_code" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Application code name.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="session_id" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The user's session id.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="user_logout_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the document that manages user's logout credentials.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="uid" type="xsd:string" default="0" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The user's login id.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="session_id" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The user's session id.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="user_session_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the document that manages the user's session data.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="login_id" type="xsd:string" default="0" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The user's login id.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ws_token" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A security token that is used by the user to access web services once successfully logged in.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="session_id" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The user's session id.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="auth_session_id" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The session id of the application performing authentication for the user.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="fname" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The user's first name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="lname" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The user's last name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="access_level" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The access level</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="gateway_interface" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The gateway interface</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="remote_host" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The remote host the user received its authentication</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="remote_addr" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The remote host's IP address</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="remote_app_name" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The remote host's application code name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="server_protocol" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The protocol used</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="server_software" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The server software</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="server_name" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The server name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="server_port" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The server port</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="user_agent" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>User agent</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="local" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The local</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="accept" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>accept</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="accept_lang" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>accept language</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="accept_encoding" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>accept encoding</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="scheme" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The scheme</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="server_info" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Server information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="servlet_context" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Servlet Context</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="session_create" type="xsd:long" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A long number representing the date and time the session was created</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="session_last_accessed" type="xsd:long" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A long number representing the date and time the session was last active.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="session_max" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates in seconds how long the session will last without any user activity before timing out</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="orig_app_id" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The original application code name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="group_id" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The group the user belongs</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="roles" type="app_role_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A list of the user's application roles</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="user_app_login_check_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the document that manages user's login credentials.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="uid" type="xsd:string" default="0" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The user's login id.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="app_code" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Application code name.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="session_id" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The user's session id.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="signed_on" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates the authentication status of a user. true indicates that the user is already signed on. Otherwise, the user is not signed on.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="session_token" type="user_session_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The user's session token.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="resourcetype_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the document that manages resource types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="rsrc_type_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The id of the resource.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="rsrc_type_descr" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The description of the resource type.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="resource_subtype_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the document that manages resource sub types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="rsrc_subtype_id" type="xsd:integer" default="0" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The id of the resource sub type</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="rsrc_type_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The id of the resource.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="rsrc_subtype_name" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The name of the resource sub type.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="rsrc_subtype_descr" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The description of the resource sub type.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="resource_ext_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is an extended version of the document that manages user resource types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="rsrc_id" type="xsd:integer" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the user resource unique id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="rsrc_name" type="xsd:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the user resource unique id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="rsrc_type" type="resource_type" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The resource type of the user resource</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="rsrc_sub_type" type="resource_subtype_type" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The resource sub type of the user resource</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="url" type="xsd:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The URL used to invoke the user resource</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="host" type="xsd:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The host where the user resource lives</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="description" type="xsd:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The long description of the user resource</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="secured" type="xsd:boolean" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" default="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates whether or not the user resource is secured</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="resource_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the document that manages user resource types minus resource type and resource sub type elements.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="rsrc_id" type="xsd:integer" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the user resource unique id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="rsrc_name" type="xsd:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the user resource unique id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="url" type="xsd:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The URL used to invoke the user resource</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="host" type="xsd:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The host where the user resource lives</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="description" type="xsd:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The long description of the user resource</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="secured" type="xsd:boolean" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" default="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates whether or not the user resource is secured</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="rsrc_type_id" type="xsd:integer" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the id of the resource type</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="rsrc_type_name" type="xsd:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the name of the resource type</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="rsrc_subtype_id" type="xsd:integer" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the id of the resource sub type</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="rsrc_subtype_name" type="xsd:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the name of the resource sub type</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="resource_access_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the document tracks the resources that have be granted and revoked for a given user.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="user_uid" type="xsd:integer" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the user's unique id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="login_id" type="xsd:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the user's login id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="user_firstname" type="xsd:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the user's first name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="user_lastname" type="xsd:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the user's last name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="granted_resources" type="resource_type" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is a list of resources that have been granted to said user</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="revoked_resources" type="resource_type" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is a list of resources that have been revoked from the said user.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="role_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the document that manages roles.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="role_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The id of the user's role.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="role_name" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The name of the user's role</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="application_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the document that manages application data.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="app_id" type="xsd:integer" default="1" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The id of the application.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="app_code" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The code name of the application.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="description" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The description of the application.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="active" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Status of the application. Active equals true and Inactive equals false.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="app_role_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the document that manages user's application roles.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="app_role_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The application role id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="app_role_code" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The application role code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="app_role_name" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The application role name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="app_role_desc" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The application role description</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="base_role" type="role_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The base role type</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="app_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The base application id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="user_app_roles_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="user_info" type="user_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="true"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>User Type Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="app_info" type="application_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="true"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Application Type Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="assigned_roles" type="app_role_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" nillable="true"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>One or more assigned application roles</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="revoked_roles" type="app_role_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" nillable="true"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>One or more revoked application roles</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="user_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The profile of a user</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="login_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>User's Primary Key value</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="user_name" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>User's login id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="first_name" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>User's first name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="last_name" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>User's last name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="short_name" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>User's name in the format: [last name, first name]</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="email" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>User's email address</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="logged_in" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates whether user is currently logged into the system. A value of true equals user is logged in. Otherwise, the indicator will equal false.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="dob" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Date of birth of the user.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="total_logons" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The total number of times the user has successfully logged into the system.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ssn" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The user's social security number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="start_date" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date and time user's security profile was created.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="term_date" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date and time the user's security profile was terminated.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="active" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates whether user's security profile is currently active. A value of true equals user is active. An inactive user status will equal false.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="description" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A description of the user's profile.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="RMT2_Message_Header_Type.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="RMT2_Message_Reply_Status_Type.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="authentication/Authentication_Type.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="RS_authentication_login"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="header" type="header_type" minOccurs="1" nillable="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">Known as the Web Service Header. This element is to be used as part of the request data. Contains the data needed to identify and route message to its property service implementation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="reply_status" type="reply_status_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The status of the content web service invocation. The return code will be greater than or equal to zero indicating the total number of records retrieved. Otherwise, a value less than zero is present when an error occurs.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="session_token" type="user_session_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the session token given to the user once successfully logged into the system. This token can be used access other remote services.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:complexType name="reply_status_type" mixed="false" abstract="false"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="return_status" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates if the reply is successful or erroneous</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string" id="return_status_type"> <xsd:enumeration value="SUCCESS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ERROR"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="message" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" nillable="true"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This is the message text</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ext_message" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" nillable="true"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This the long version of the message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="return_code" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" type="xsd:integer" nillable="true"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The return code indicating success or failure</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>
